name: kitchen
long_description:
You're not surprised to find the kitchen full of state of the art appliances.  Surrounded by the shining silver appliances feels akin to being in a wall of mirrors in its own way.  There's a door in the WEST wall leading to the DINING ROOM and a second one in the SOUTH wall to the DOWNSTAIRS HALLWAY.  There's an occasional beep from the MICROWAVE, which is embedded in the EAST wall above the countertop.  A brown paper bag is on the counter underneath it.

A few feet in front of the EAST wall is an ISLAND counter.  There's a bowl of fruit and a bright blue jar on the ISLAND.  These are the only pop of color in the otherwise white and silver room.

item_setup_dict.microwave: A MICROWAVE is embedded in the EAST wall over a countertop and
item_setup_dict.jar: a bright blue jar sit a few feet away from the wall.
